RetrieveCalendarEvents.success_prompt: Summarize appointments and provide them in a simplified manner without IDs.

AddCalendarEvent.init_prompt: Appointments can only be added if no other appointment exists in the requested time period.
AddCalendarEvent.success_prompt: Confirm the successful addition of the appointment.

MoveCalendarEvent.init_prompt: Appointments can only be moved if no other appointment exists at the target time period.
MoveCalendarEvent.success_prompt: Confirm the successful move of the appointment.

DeleteCalendarEvent.init_prompt: Only delete appointments if this is explicitly requested in the request.
DeleteCalendarEvent.success_prompt: Confirm the successful deletion of the appointment.
